mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reward_buy_overview(buyNo, projectNo, memberNo, totalAmount, shipAmount, finalAmount, boughtDate) VALUES(#{buyNo}, #{projectNo}, #{memberNo}, #{totalAmount}, #{shipAmount}, #{totalAmount} + #{shipAmount}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO reward_buy_detail(detailNo, buyNo, rewardNo, requestQuantity, purchasePrice, optionAnswer) VALUES(reward_buy_detail_seq.NEXTVAL, #{buyNo}, #{rewardNo}, #{requestQuantity}, #{purchasePrice}, #{optionAnswer, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO reward_shipping_location(buyNo, phone, zipCode, address1, address2, recipient, message) VALUES(#{buyNo}, #{phone}, #{zipCode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{recipient}, #{message})
INSERT INTO reward_buy_cancel(cancelNo, buyNo, canceledAmount, memo, canceledDate) VALUES(reward_buy_cancel_seq.NEXTVAL, #{buyNo}, #{canceledAmount}, #{memo}, SYSDATE)
